scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:alpha: standard-version --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:beta: standard-version --prerelease beta && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
